title: Veritas et Fortitudo - Europa Universalis IV mod
description:
Veritas et Fortitudo - Europa Universalis IV mod


COMPATIBLE WITH EUIV 1.7 and Res Publica!

Veritas et Fortitudo, the successor to the popular "Glory of Byzantium" mod offers significantly extended gameplay in both historical and alternate history modes on a new map with breathtaking scope.

* An extended timeline from 1309 to 1865
* A new map with over 600 new additional provinces and over 100 new countries
* Completely revised gameplay, including additional mechanics like Administrative Power, Monarch Capacity, Aristocratic Power and more!
* New technological model with 50 technology levels, 10 Idea Group slots and Technology research
* New orders of Battle for Western, Eastern, Byzantine, Ottoman and Muslim armies
* Trade overhaul with new trade map, over 25 new trade goods, trade leagues and policies
* Visual and audio overhaul with new units, event pictures, flags, icons and music
* Smoothest Overhaul on the Market!
* First Large, Complete Overhaul Mod with a new map available on Steam!


Extract 7zip file to C:Users[user]DocumentsParadox InteractiveEuropa Universalis IVmod
